verbs.description: i [V: ’ve] been putting off a root canal for years is that bad a dentist might recommend a root canal for an infected tooth a broken tooth or a deep cavity if this procedure is delayed it could result in a worsened spreading infection and a more difficult root canal infection dr matthew malek root canal
